import sys

for i in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    array = map(int, raw_input().split())
    
   
    minn = min(array[1:])
    
    for j in xrange(1, len(array)):
        if minn == array[j]:
            index = j
            break
        
    if minn <= array[0]:
        print str(index) * (minn + 1)
    else:
        print "1" + '0' * (array[0] + 1)
